name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Senior Frontend Developer
professional_summary: Utilized React.js to build scalable user interfaces for insurance claim processing, improving user experience by addressing slow loading times through code splitting and lazy loading.
Developed reusable React components for healthcare dashboards, ensuring compliance with HIPAA regulations and reducing development time by 40%.
Integrated RESTful APIs using Axios in a banking application, enhancing data retrieval efficiency and improving transaction processing speed.
Implemented Redux for state management in a fintech platform, streamlining data flow and reducing bugs related to state inconsistencies.
Collaborated with backend teams to optimize GraphQL queries, improving API response times and enhancing overall application performance.
Ensured code quality through Jest unit testing and ESLint in a consulting project, achieving 95% test coverage and minimizing runtime errors.
Participated in code reviews and pair programming sessions, sharing knowledge and improving team productivity by 25%.
Used Webpack and Babel to bundle and transpile code, reducing bundle size by 30% and improving application load times.
Implemented responsive design using CSS Grid and Flexbox, ensuring seamless user experience across devices and browsers.
Worked with TypeScript to enhance code maintainability and catch errors early, improving development efficiency in a large-scale project.
Integrated Material UI components to standardize design across applications, reducing UI development time by 50%.
Set up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, automating testing and deployment processes and reducing manual effort.
Used Docker to containerize React applications, ensuring consistent environments across development, testing, and production.
Optimized frontend performance using Lighthouse audits, improving page load times and enhancing user satisfaction.
Collaborated with UX designers to implement user-centric designs, improving user engagement by 35%.
Documented code and development processes, facilitating knowledge transfer and onboarding for new team members.
Troubleshot and debugged complex frontend issues, ensuring smooth application functionality and user experience.
Stayed updated with latest frontend trends and technologies, continuously improving skills and contributing to team growth.
